name: Delta Rover:Rock Blast Shooter
description:
Fun blasting war cannon with color blasts along with cannon shooting. This game gives you the ultimate package to win crypto currency for all the enthusiasts of video games and ball shooter games with the total of 148 levels along with endless mode. Delta Rover cannon shooter is an exciting game in all kinds from rock shooting games, color blast games to ball blazing games. You will definitely love transforming & upgrading your delta rover’s high-end vehicles with powerful weapons in the delta rover rock smasher game.
The aliens are all over our cities as well as in the boss levels. Thus, be their Champion by using your spacecraft to guard and save your city. This isn’t just a game, it’s a challenge. Achieve tons of crypto currency and cash them out with ease. This game is integrated with Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, USDT , XRP and Doge.
Free Download, free login and collect coins , cumulate cash .



Simple & Addictive Gameplay With Crypto Integration

A classic cannon now just gets better in its upgraded version - THE DELTA ROVER!
Swipe the DELTA ROVER ball blaster left and right to dodge the bouncing thrilling Color Balls while trying to shoot and smash them in this ball blaster game. Once we hit the ball with the delta rover ball shooter, the jumping color balls gets destroyed or blasted into smaller balls with cannon shooter weapon.


Get daily and hourly time-based Rewards, Coins, Gems, Hearts and the ultimate crypto currency. Don't forget hitting the Bonus Balls with your powerful Delta Rover Machine and become the Highest Scorer World-Wide at Leaderboard.

Whenever, Wherever, The Easy Bomber Color Ball Blast | Upgrade for your Delta Rover | Rock Ball Shooter Blast

You can upgrade your Rover ball shooter vehicles within the rover range and many more in order to make the DELTA ROVER shots more powerful than ever. You can select rovers from a wide range namely Challenger, Equinox, Mathilda, Ex-Machina, Void Maker, Behemoth, Nemesis and Delta Rover.


• You can select different perks like Health kit, Shield, Air Strike, Lightning Strike and will have many more in the game upgrades.



Challenging Boss Levels
• This Delta Rover ball shooting game is perfectly balanced. You will never get bored of this engaging and fascinating game, where the challenges and the levels get interesting. Our DELTA ROVER (cannon ball breaker) becomes more powerful in ball shooting games or cannon shooting games.
• You will combat different Bosses on different Planets in Space. Fight with Alien Boss, Mother Alien Ships and UFO’s in BOSS LEVELS.
• You have many Challenging levels in several cities of different countries namely Dubai, London, Paris, Shanghai, Delhi and Tokyo.
Easy & Friendly Interface
• This Delta Rover rock blast game in incorporated with simple and user-friendly interface.
Enjoy this super interesting DELTA ROVER- Rock Blast Shooter cannon shooter game, be a great Delta Rover master shooter and blast The Monster Aliens to save the WORLD!
